summary: This document is a Restricted Stock Unit Award Agreement dated August 18, 2025, between Live Oak Bancshares, Inc. and Walter J. Phifer, granting 14,581 restricted stock units under the company's 2015 Omnibus Stock Incentive Plan. The units will vest according to the terms outlined in Exhibit A, and the shares will be delivered upon vesting, subject to tax withholding and compliance with securities laws. The agreement also addresses the non-transferability of the units, tax consequences, and the application of Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code.
